messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Activate your suit sensors so we know if you are murdered

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of energy draining parasites have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We can send a tech man over if you need

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Egg Fortress Echo. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.
